name: Nature Mahjong
description:
Mahjong against the backdrop of mesmerizing nature! Radiating freshness, soothing music and relaxing levels await in this game!

There are over 100 Mahjong game layouts to choose from! Starting with simple and classic ones to exquisitely themed ones. Explore 6 locations full of amazing puzzles. Multi-layered levels and huge 200 chip layouts! Just what you've been looking for!

- collect gold chips to pass the levels and unlock the next location
- collect bonus chips and get extra coins and bonuses
- combo multiplier to boost your coins
- 6 locations
- 120 levels
